volunteer_experience.info: Served as the teaching assistant for the rural NGO Spandanam based in Barasat, Kolkata and coordinated, monitored and evaluated over 100+ students across the village. Assessed their overall performance to track and monitor their growth in the overall academic performance. Took up various projects to encourage the students and ensure a holistic teaching learning approach.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Barasat Spandanam - India
volunteer_experience.title: Teaching Volunteer

volunteer_experience.info: Served as a volunteer at CRY India during the six week long campaign to combat child labour. Underwent training and raised funds for curbing the practice of child labour and sending children back to school through various initiatives.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: CRY - Child Rights and You
volunteer_experience.title: Volunteer
